info.description:
## üìå Compliance Risk Scoring API ‚Äî Overview

This collection contains APIs for a **machine learning‚Äìpowered risk scoring service** built using **FastAPI and Scikit-learn**. The service evaluates transactional data in real time and assigns a **risk score and classification (LOW / MEDIUM / HIGH)**.

### üîß What the APIs Do

- **Health Check** ‚Äì Verifies service availability
    
- **Predict (Single)** ‚Äì Scores one transaction for risk
    
- **Predict (Batch)** ‚Äì Scores multiple transactions in a single request
    

### ‚öôÔ∏è Environment Setup

This collection uses a Postman environment variable:

- **`baseUrl`** (example: `http://127.0.0.1:8000`)
    

Select the **Local** environment before sending requests.  
  
To change environments, update the `baseUrl` value.

### üìò API Documentation

Interactive Swagger UI is available at:

- **`{{baseUrl}}/docs`**
    

### üß† Notes

The model is trained on **synthetic transactional data** to demonstrate an end-to-end ML inference workflow, focusing on production-ready API design and backend‚ÄìML integration.
